moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Rolling Kick
moves.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Jump Kick
moves.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moves.name: Mind Reader
moves.description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Blaze Kick
moves.description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
